briefdescription.para: 1 sign, 4 exponent (bias 7), 3 mantissa; finite-only saturation policy.

memberdef.argsstring: (float minv, float maxv, int symmetric, float *out_scale, int8_t *out_zero)
memberdef.name: ie_act_i8_params_from_minmax

briefdescription.para: Compute per-tensor INT8 parameters from observed min/max.

detaileddescription.para:
If symmetric != 0:
zero_point is set to 0
scale is derived from max(|minv|,|maxv|)/127

If symmetric == 0:
parameters map minv -> -128 and maxv -> 127 using an affine transform

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *src, int8_t *dst, size_t n, ie_act_i8_params params, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_quantize_act_int8

briefdescription.para: Quantize fp32 activations to INT8 using per-tensor parameters.

parameterdescription.para: Non-zero to enforce symmetric saturation policy.

memberdef.argsstring: (const int8_t *src, float *dst, size_t n, ie_act_i8_params params)
memberdef.name: ie_dequantize_act_int8

briefdescription.para: Dequantize INT8 activations to fp32 using per-tensor parameters.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *src, size_t n, size_t group_size, int symmetric, float *out_scales, int8_t *out_zeros)
memberdef.name: ie_act_i8_group_params_from_data

briefdescription.para: Compute per-group INT8 parameters from data.

detaileddescription.para: Splits src into contiguous groups of group_size (last group may be shorter) and computes parameters for each group.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *src, int8_t *dst, size_t n, size_t group_size, const float *scales, const int8_t *zeros, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_quantize_act_int8_per_group

briefdescription.para: Quantize fp32 activations to INT8 using per-group parameters.

parameterdescription.para: Non-zero to enforce symmetric saturation policy.

memberdef.argsstring: (const int8_t *src, float *dst, size_t n, size_t group_size, const float *scales, const int8_t *zeros)
memberdef.name: ie_dequantize_act_int8_per_group

briefdescription.para: Dequantize per-group INT8 activations to fp32.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *src, uint8_t *dst, size_t n, ie_fp8_format fmt)
memberdef.name: ie_quantize_act_fp8

listitem.para: E4M3: non-finite inputs saturate to max finite.
E5M2: attempts to preserve Inf/NaN encodings.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *src, float *dst, size_t n, ie_fp8_format fmt)
memberdef.name: ie_dequantize_act_fp8
